articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Australia play Sri Lanka in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: Sri Lanka bat v Australia with both sides seeking first win

articles.description: Reaction as Scotland qualify for Euro 2024 following Spain's victory in Norway as Wales win at home against Croatia to boost their hopes.
articles.title: Scotland qualify for Euros as Wales boost hopes - reaction

articles.description: It has not been a fun year for England rugby fans, but they finally got some joy back in Marseille on Sunday.
articles.title: England shred nerves but return joy to fans in Marseille

articles.description: South Africa advance after a thrilling quarter-final in which they put an end to France's dream of a World Cup win on home soil.
articles.title: 'Colossal' Boks break French hearts in epic contest

articles.description: Australia's David Warner takes an "outstanding" catch to remove Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka for 61 during their Cricket World Cup match in Lucknow.
articles.title: Warner takes 'outstanding' catch to remove Nissanka

articles.description: Scotland manager Steve Clarke hails his player for reaching successive European Championships and doubts they "will fully realise the significance of their achievement yet".
articles.title: Fans helped Scotland become 'feared once again' - Clarke

articles.description: Ireland's latest World Cup quarter-final exit will be hard for the group to get over and was a cruel way for Johnny Sexton to bow out, writes Tommy Bowe.
articles.title: 'Ireland will carry heavier World Cup burden without Sexton'

articles.description: A defiant Robert Page pays an emotional tribute to his Wales side after they beat Croatia to revive their hopes of qualifying for Euro 2024.
articles.title: Defiant Page 'immensely proud' of Wales win over Croatia

articles.description: Cricket will be part of the 2028 Olympics after International Olympic Committee members vote to include the sport for the Los Angeles Games.
articles.title: Cricket accepted for 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles

articles.description: BBC Scotland assesses the priorities facing Philippe Clement as he begins the task of revitalising Rangers.
articles.title: Four main tasks in new Rangers boss Clement's in tray
